etymology.description: Phonetic: 兀 (wù, "rugged") + Semantic: 虫 (chóng, "insect") -> combined to represent a specific type of long snake or dragon
etymology.interpretation: The character 虺 (huǐ, "snake") combines 兀 (wù, "rugged") for its sound with 虫 (chóng, "insect") to semantically signify a snake, emphasizing its slithering, insect-like nature.
